name: SafetyKit
headline: AI-Powered Trust and Safety Automation
description:
SafetyKit replaces human Trust and Safety reviewers with language models.

We make it easy for enterprise Trust and Safety teams to supercharge their content review workflows ‚Äî speeding up agent decision-making 5x or by automating the review altogether ‚Äî and significantly reduce operations costs with faster, more accurate decisions.

With SafetyKit, Trust and Safety teams write their policies in natural language and use them to detect and action nefarious content, instantly.  Each decision is accompanied by an explanation grounded in your policies ‚Äî not a generic definition or model score.  We allow TnS teams to confidently scale their capacity, freeing up your agents for the highest leverage work, while reducing those agents exposure to problematic content.

founders.name: David Graunke, Founder
founders.description: David led engineering for risk reviews at Stripe for fraud, credit, content moderation, and financial crimes. He built the policy and workflow engine that scaled Stripe from internal reviewers to thousands of outsourced vendor agents.

founders.name: Steven Guichard, Founder
founders.description:
Steven is a cofounder of SafetyKit, working to replace human trust and safety reviewers with language models.

Previously he worked at Carbic as the first software engineer and later as the CEO. There he helped build ultrasonic flow sensors which were installed on oil pipelines and offshore rigs around the world.

Steven also cofounded Thomas Street, a software design and engineering consultancy, where he worked with companies like Cisco, Roche, and DirecTV.

# Automate your manual risk, compliance, and safety workflows.
Monitor your entire portfolio without relying on expensive humans or inaccurate ML models. We follow the workflows and SOPs your agents already use, faster and more accurately.
![SafetyKit screenshot](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FIllustration.0af67769.png&w=3840&q=75)
Trusted by
Forward-looking teams trust SafetyKit to help keep their users and platforms safe.
  * ![Patreon](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fpatreon.8220cc99.png&w=384&q=75)
  * ![Substack](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fsubstack.ea61ebe9.png&w=384&q=75)
  * ![Eventbrite](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FEventbrite_Logo.svg.cb61da1e.png&w=384&q=75)
  * ![Character.ai](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FCharacter.5abe9dd3.png&w=640&q=75)
  * ![Faire](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffaire.5b3fc957.png&w=384&q=75)


Stop throwing people at the problem.
[Book a demo](https://www.safetykit.com/<schedule-demo>)
Automate tedious work and upskill your team to cover more risks without more headcount or engineering resources.
Human-level
Accuracy
20,000
Reviews per minute
100%
policy coverage
![SafetyKit screenshot](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FFeatureIllustration1.86d26b0e.png&w=1200&q=75)
Escape the human operations trap
Risk and compliance operations work can feel endless: training vendor agents, tooling updates, BPO contracts, quality measurement, and more. SafetyKit lets you focus on what matters: protecting users and keeping bad stuff off your platform.
![SafetyKit screenshot](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FFeatureIllustration2.e74ee4a1.png&w=1200&q=75)
Cover more risks, more accurately
Define what you do and don't want on your platform and have AI models execute those policies with better-than-human precision and speed. Customize policies based on region and product ‚Äî SafetyKit scales to the complexities of your business.
![SafetyKit screenshot](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FFeatureIllustration3.16f3ccef.png&w=3840&q=75)
Automation you can stand behind ‚Äî without engineering or ML help
Getting it right matters. SafetyKit makes policy-backed decisions with a detailed, human-readable paper trail. And SafetyKit takes the whole context into account ‚Äî text, images, audio, metadata, and websites.
## Use cases
Every platform has its own risks. SafetyKit is built to handle the most complex and nuanced Trust and Safety policies.
Enforce marketplace rules and policies
Support more users while keeping prohibited goods and services off your platform. Detect and enforce your acceptable use policy and remove counterfeit goods, dangerous products, and disallowed content.
![check icon](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FCheck_icon.2f12615d.png&w=64&q=75)
Automatically scan and monitor your merchant and seller's websites and products without engineering help.
![check icon](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FCheck_icon.2f12615d.png&w=64&q=75)
Get full coverage for Visa and Mastercard rules, which you can extend and customize.
![check icon](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FCheck_icon.2f12615d.png&w=64&q=75)
Stay up-to-date with card network rules, dangerous goods lists, and pharmaceutical guidelines.
![e-commerce illustration](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FIllustration4.09d3d473.png&w=750&q=75)
![e-commerce illustration](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FIllustration5.57aef823.png&w=1080&q=75)
User report and ticket triage automation
Identify safety and product issues before they escalate. Move beyond brittle keyword lists ‚Äî and let SafetyKit detect and categorize issues you didn't know to look for.
![check icon](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FCheck_icon.2f12615d.png&w=64&q=75)
Connect SafetyKit directly to your CRM to find, categorize, and flag important user reports and tickets.
![check icon](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FCheck_icon.2f12615d.png&w=64&q=75)
Automatically analyze and understand even the most confusing user report, including audio transcripts and images.
![check icon](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FCheck_icon.2f12615d.png&w=64&q=75)
Use SafetyKit's built-in reporting to detect trends and implement mitigations before problems grow out of control.
Ensure content quality and safety
Make sure user-generated content on your platform meets your quality and safety standards.
![check icon](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FCheck_icon.2f12615d.png&w=64&q=75)
Automatically monitor your public pages ‚Äî no engineering integration required
![check icon](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FCheck_icon.2f12615d.png&w=64&q=75)
Detect low-quality content, along with spam, scams, harassment, violent extremism, and phishing.
![policy illustration](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fpolicy_1.9f254d14.png&w=640&q=75)
![policy illustration](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fpolicy_3.a0fd6a83.png&w=640&q=75)
![policy illustration](https://www.safetykit.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fpolicy_2.cef21e1f.png&w=640&q=75)
## About us
üëã Hi there, we're the founders of SafetyKit. We built the policy and review platforms that keep users safe at Stripe.
Now we're using AI to give every company the same scale and precision, without needing custom ML models and expensive vendor agents.
Get in touch.

generated_description:
**SafetyKit**  
*Empowering Trust and Safety with AI*

**Overview**: Founded in 2023 and nestled in the tech-savvy heart of San Francisco, SafetyKit is revolutionizing how enterprises handle trust and safety management. Backed by Y Combinator‚Äôs Batch S23, this nimble startup is on a mission to ditch the outdated reliance on human reviewers by introducing an AI-powered solution that automates the content review process.

**Mission**: SafetyKit aims to enhance trust and safety automation through cutting-edge language models, enabling teams to scale their operations and reduce costs. By crafting policies in natural language, Trust and Safety (TnS) teams can swiftly detect and take action against harmful content, all while providing clear, policy-grounded explanations for every decision made.

**Key Features**:
- **Speed & Efficiency**: Amplifies decision-making efficiency by 5x or even removes the need for human intervention altogether.
- **Human-Level Accuracy**: Capable of processing up to 20,000 reviews per minute, ensuring 100% adherence to defined policies.
- **Contextual Understanding**: Unlike generic models, SafetyKit takes into account the entire context, including text and multimedia, offering nuanced understanding for complex situations.
- **Policy-Backed Decisions**: All actions are documented with detailed explanations, thus ensuring a transparent and accountable review process.

**Use Cases**:
- Enforcing marketplace rules to keep prohibited goods off platforms.
- Automating user report handling to identify issues proactively, mitigating potential escalations.
- Ensuring user-generated content meets stringent safety standards without costly human oversight.

**Team**: Comprising only 7 skilled employees, led by industry veterans David Graunke (formerly of Stripe) and Steven Guichard (ex-CEO of Carbic), SafetyKit leverages deep expertise in risk management and TnS.

**Backed By**: Prominent venture firm Y Combinator, alongside notable partners such as Gustaf Alstromer, ensuring strong support for growth.

**In a Nutshell**: SafetyKit is not just a solution; it‚Äôs a paradigm shift in trust and safety management. By combining AI technology with an understanding of TnS needs, the company is poised to help businesses operate smarter, safer, and more efficiently. If you‚Äôre ready to leave behind the cumbersome human operations trap and embrace a more scalable approach to safety, check out SafetyKit‚Äôs resources and book a demo [here](https://www.safetykit.com/).

For more info, feel free to dive into their website: [SafetyKit.com](https://www.safetykit.com/) !
